text: Ian Hill (born 20 January 1952) is an English musician, best known as the bassist and the sole continuous member for the heavy metal band Judas Priest. Along with lead guitarist Glenn Tipton, he is the only member who has appeared on all of the band's studio albums. == References == Category:British bass guitarists Category:English musicians Category:Judas Priest Category:1952 births Category:Living people
title: Ian Hill
